name: Art Lens - Creative Photo Editor!
description:
Art Lens lets you quickly and easily give images the look you want in seconds.

Simple design with powerful photo editing tools.

Packed with high quality filters and photo effects.

Add Text, Stickers, Emoticons, Artwork and Frames.

Edit with more than 75 photo filters and effects such as:
- Adjustments
- Effects
- Blur and focus -
- Rotate
- Draw
- Splash
- Crop
- Resize
- Tone curve
- Stickers
- Emoticons
- Frames
- Text
- and many more.

Turn your photos into beautifully framed works of art.

Share on Instagram, Twitter, Facebook, Messaging, and Email.
